name: 3in1
description: 3in1 - Spiritual Chat App with AI guidance based on Jesus's teachings

scripts.deploy:pages:staging: cd apps/web && run wrangler pages deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:pages:preview: cd apps/web && run wrangler pages deploy --env preview
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/worker && wrangler d1 execute 3in1-db --file=./db/schema.sql --env production
scripts.db:migrate:staging: cd apps/worker && wrangler d1 execute 3in1-db-staging --file=./db/schema.sql --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cd apps/worker && wrangler d1 execute 3in1-db-dev --file=./db/schema.sql --env development
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/worker && bun run db:migrate:dev && bun run db:seed
scripts.setup: echo 'Run setup commands in individual app directories'
scripts.secrets:list: cd apps/worker && wrangler secret list --env production
scripts.secrets:worker: cd apps/worker && echo 'Set up OPENAI_API_KEY, GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID, GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET'
